data_table.description: Lumbar Aortic Calcification, Original Cohort Exams 9 - 11, 21 - 23. These data are derived from spine x-rays and recorded around Exams 10 and 22 in the original Framingham cohort subjects. X-rays were read in 1995 - 1997. Lumbar aortic calcification was scored on each x-ray. Some subjects had x-rays only at the earlier exam and some only at the later exam. Some subjects had x-rays at both exams. There is a record for each exam. No one has more than two x-rays (records). The data were double entered, compared and resolved if there were differences.
